title: Geometric Transformations and Congruence

vocab.definition: Moving a shape to a new position
Sliding a shape without rotating or flipping it
Turning a shape around a fixed point
Flipping a shape over a line
Shapes that are the same size and shape

teachingNotes: Use coordinate grids to practice transformations. Show how transformations preserve shape and size.

sample.question: What is moving a shape to a new position called?

truefalse.question: Congruent shapes have the same size and shape.

multiplechoice.question: What transformation slides a shape without rotating it?

fillintheblank.question: Flipping a shape over a line is called a ________.

shortanswer.question: What happens to the size of a shape during transformations?

wordProblems.question: A triangle at (1,2), (3,2), (2,4) is translated 3 units right and 2 units up. What are the new coordinates of (1,2)?
